Package xyz.controllers

Class PageController

java.lang.Object
xyz.controllers.BaseController
xyz.controllers.PageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.javalin.http.Handler
public class PageController
extends BaseController
Page controller provides basic page functionality but most page logic is handled by its owner the site. Pages are the only model objects stored inside of another DBNode since sites are the full owners they handle most Page logic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PageController​(xyz.dbkit.DBMain db_instance, AppManager app)
    Instantiates a new Page controller.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void AddFiles​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Adds page file to the sites filesystem
    void EditFileContents​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Edits a pages file contents with the provide POST form parameter contents
    void FileContents​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Gets Page file contents from form params (name) PageName, & (path) filepath
    void Get​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Gets all pages in the Pages DBNode, this route should not typically be used since sites store pages.
    void GetID​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Gets page by UID using path parameter id
    void GetPage​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Gets a page from an associated site.
    void UpdatePage​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
    Updates a pages contents

    • GetPage

      public void GetPage​(io.javalin.http.Context ctx)
      Gets a page from an associated site. This is the typical method you should use when dealing with sites. Takes the form param (name) for a PageName and gets the associated Site from SiteID
      Parameters:
      ctx - the ctx
